title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository with CLI, REST API, and model library for running large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing simple Pythonic interface to interact with Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of Ollama models within LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, and RAG capabilities.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama with comprehensive API coverage and Spring Boot integration.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby on Rails integration for Ollama with ActiveRecord-like interface for model interactions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models as AI coding assistant with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama enabling AI conversations in Discord servers.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced CLI chat interface for Ollama with conversation history and context management.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package for Ollama JavaScript client with TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client with async and streaming support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm charts for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit web interface for Ollama with model comparison and parameter tuning.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-Augmented Generation implementation with Ollama and vector databases.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama enabling pipeline-based NLP workflows.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with threaded conversations and model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for Ollama bringing AI assistance to note-taking workflows.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot for Ollama with group chat support and custom model commands.
